title: Salem Maritime National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved                   NPS Centennial               Donate               Volunteer               Work With Us         Â    Looking for ways to get involved?  NPS Centennial The National Park Service will celebrate its 100th birthday on August 25, 2016. Take a look at what we're doing to celebrate and our efforts to connect with and create the next generation of visitors, supporters, and advocates.   Donate Your support will enhance programs and efforts to preserve park resources and visitor services at Salem Maritime National Historic Site.   Volunteer Explore the many opportunities to help care for your National Parks. Salem Maritime National Historic Site relies on its volunteers to help protect and preserve our natural and cultural treasures.   Work With Us Experience your America and build a fulfilling career by joining the National Park Service. Keep an eye out for year-round and seasonal positions, internships and more at Salem Maritime National Historic Site.
